front.title: IEEE Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks-Media Access Control (MAC) Service Definition
front.abstract: The MAC service provided by all IEEE 802(R) MACs along with the Internal Sublayer Service (ISS) that is provided by IEEE 802 MACs to the relay function of a Media Access Control(MAC) Bridge are defined in this standard. The PDF of this standard is available at no cost compliments of the GETIEEE802 program located at http://standards.ieee.org/about/get/index.html
